title: Honor sistem
body:
Why don't people who were honor lvl5, last season get all the rewards for jumping the new honor sistem, all the way to honor lvl2 checkpoint 3, I mean those are 4 keys we are not getting. Please someone explain it to me :)

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: By starting at rank 2.3 you're getting *better* rewards faster. Once you hit rank 5 you still keep getting orbs which contain more loot than the 2.1/2.2 checkpoints. Overall, this is just our way of getting you more and better rewards faster since you were honorable last season.
People who were Honor 5 have quicker access to higher rewards as they were placed a few checkpoints ahead, and will sooner collect those Honor 5+ rewards as opposed to those who were behind.
